Name: PIXARK
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install PIXARK and run it (a normal server startup of PIXARK can take a long time!).

UDP1 - Game Port.Name: UDP1 - Game Port
UDP1 - Game Port.Description: UDP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

UDP2 - Cube Port.Name: UDP2 - Cube Port
UDP2 - Cube Port.Description: UDP Cube Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

UDP3 - Query Port.Name: UDP3 - Query Port
UDP3 - Query Port.Description: UDP Query Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Server Name.Name: Server Name
Server Name.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

Server Password.Name: Server Password
Server Password.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

Server Admin Password.Name: Server Admin Password
Server Admin Password.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

Game Parameters.Name: Game Parameters
Game Parameters.Description: Enter your game parameters seperated with ? and start with a ? (don't put spaces in between eg: ?MaxPlayers=40?FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures=true)

Extra Game Parameters.Name: Extra Game Parameters
Extra Game Parameters.Description: Type in your Extra Game Parameters seperated with a space and - (eg: -DisableDeathSpectator -UseBattlEye)
